page.title: 14A THORESBY PIT DAY SHIFT
page.content: Many{miners}work a{shift system,} days,nights or afternoons.An ordinary day shift starts at 6.00 and ends at 1.00. Many miners go to the canteen for breakfast or a drink before changing,collecting{helmet,lamp and {batteries,self-rescuer and water {bottle.}A plastic and brass tally are collected with the plastic one handed in when he goes down and the brass handed in when he resurfaces. At the bottom of the pitshaft he is directed by the{Overman}who decides the day's work.Travel to the{coal face is by{paddy-train,man-rider and on {foot.}On a hot face men strip down to shorts and need to drink a lot. They have a twenty minute break for{snap} and at the end of a shift surface for showers,food and drink.There are many different jobs eg.{blacksmith,deputy, {electrician,belt-operators,joiners.
